name: Zucchini Casserole
ingredients: 6 small zucchini, sliced in half moons, 24 ounces
1 batch Dottie's Cream of Mushroom Soup for Recipes
utensils: Large casserole dish (3 quarts or larger)

instructions.en: Brown ground beef with onion, salt, and pepper in a large skillet; drain fat.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso s cibuľou, soľou a korením na veľkej panvici; zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで挽肉、玉ねぎ、塩、コショウを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Transfer meat to a large, greased casserole dish.
instructions.sk: Preložte mäso do veľkej, vymastenej zapekacej misy.
instructions.ja: 肉を大きな油を塗ったキャセロール皿に移します。

instructions.en: Sauté zucchini and mushrooms until almost tender; season lightly and add to the ground beef in the casserole.
instructions.sk: Opečte cuketu a huby, kým nebudú takmer mäkké; jemne ochuťte a pridajte k mletému mäsu v zapekacej mise.
instructions.ja: ズッキーニとマッシュルームをほぼ柔らかくなるまで炒めます。軽く味付けし、キャセロール皿の挽肉に加えます。

instructions.en: Prepare Dottie's Cream of Mushroom Soup and stir into meat and vegetable mixture along with the cheese. Adjust seasoning if necessary.
instructions.sk: Pripravte Dottieho krémovú hubovú polievku a vmiešajte do zmesi mäsa a zeleniny spolu so syrom. V prípade potreby upravte ochutenie.
instructions.ja: ドッティーのクリームマッシュルームスープを準備し、肉と野菜の混ぜ物に加え、チーズと一緒に混ぜます。必要に応じて味を調整します。

instructions.en: Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri 175°C 30 minút alebo kým nebude horúce a bublajúce.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで30分間、または熱々になり泡立つまで焼きます。

notes: Makes about 8 servings. Can be frozen.
